top_comments.comment: We cannot say koweit, emiratis and saoudis people are not responsible of the heat : they are rich from oil and produce more carbon than anyone in the world
I bet VAMPIRES would hate this place.

comments_since_last_sample.body: We cannot say koweit, emiratis and saoudis people are not responsible of the heat : they are rich from oil and produce more carbon than anyone in the world

Put more heat into a desert and start bitching about the high temperatures.
Geniuses.
الله يحمي الكويت وسائر الدول العربية

Climate change is the most profound existential crisis in human history. But the majority of  comments are annoyed by a young woman for being an influencer. This is why the human race is in deep, deep trouble.
